name: Notion Packing List & Travel Planner
description: A handy Packing List & Travel Planner for any occasion!We’ve created a handy Travel Planner and Packing List for you for any upcoming events & trips (personal or business).What's inside?Customise the curated packing lists with all of the your items needed on a trip somewhere (personal or business)Jump straight in through filtered views of personal travel destinations or seasonsManage any last minute shopping with a handy ‘To buy’ list and calendar view.Why this Packing List & Travel
features: Customise the curated packing lists with all of the your items needed on a trip somewhere (personal or business); Jump straight in through filtered views of personal travel destinations or seasons; Manage any last minute shopping with a handy ‘To buy’ list and calendar view.
